trans-unit.resname: DDO·5 | Court Street Denizen | Card Text

trans-unit.resname: DDO·5 | Court Street Denizen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Boros fight for justice. The Azorius fight for law. I hold the line between, and make sure the people are given both."
